body:
Comment 3: 
Here's a slightly streamlined version for testing purposes:


package main

type T0 struct {
	p interface {
		print(int)
	}
}

type T1 int
type T2 struct{}

func (T1) print(x int) {
	println("T1 printing", x)
}

func (T2) print(x int) {
	println("T2 printing", x)
}
func main() {
	t1 := T1(0)
	t2 := T2{}

	t1.print(3)
	t2.print(3)
	
	T0{t1}.p.print(5)
	T0{t2}.p.print(5)
}
